thread.title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: The Chips Are Down for Toshiba, Thanks to China

author: ComputerMagazine
title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: The Chips Are Down for Toshiba, Thanks to China
text: The Chips Are Down for Toshiba, Thanks to China From WSJ.com: WSJD: The Chips Are Down for Toshiba, Thanks to China Posted On : Published By : ComputerMagazine Toshiba has yet to win approval from Chinese authorities for the $19 billion sale of its chip unit, raising the likelihood it will miss its deadline to close the deal. This syndicated article brought to you by Computer Magazine from WSJ.com: WSJD. View the rest of the article at the original publisher's site here Your email address will not be published.
